title: P2 Team looking for mid lane
body:
Hey, currently a p2 team, looking for a mid laner that will play regularly. Preferably D5+ and someone that can compete with high diamonds.

Comment away in this format please

IGN
Pool
Rank
Age

replies.body:
IGN: Sushix
Pool: Ahri, Viktor, Azir, Ziggs, Cassiopeia, Orianna, Syndra
Rank: Plat 2
Age: 18

No worries if I wont work as I haven't hit diamond yet, just thought I would throw my name in for consideration.
